name: Click to Chat – WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget
author: NinjaTeam

sections.description:
NinjaTeam Click to Chat plugin comes with multiple chat apps and messaging platforms to allow your customers to click to contact support.

With this WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget Plugin, you can create a click to chat button on the corner of your website. When clicked or tapped, this floating button expands into various chat apps so that your customers can choose the one they prefer.

WP Click to Chat Floating Widget – DEMO

⚡️ FEATURES

This WordPress Support All-in-One Floating Widget enhances the customer experience on your site by offering multiple ways to get in touch:

  • Email
  • Phone
  • WhatsApp
  • Facebook Messenger
  • Facebook page
  • Facebook group
  • Telegram
  • Skype
  • Line
  • Viber
  • Snapchat
  • WeChat
  • KakaoTalk
  • Zalo
  • Extra phone number
  • Link to Google Maps shop location
  • Link to review platforms like Tripadvisor, Yelp, Amazon, etc.
  • Custom links

User interface features:

  • Drag & drop interface: easily move apps up and down
  • Custom link/app: add your own icons or links to other social chat platforms
  • Display options: right or left corner
  • Customizable design: padding, effects, and colors
  • Multiple languages supported: English, German, Spanish, Italian, French, Japanese, etc.
  • RTL supported: Hebrew, Arabic, Persian, Kurdish, etc.

🔑 HOW IT WORKS

After activating the plugin, you don’t need to fill in any license. Just go to Click to Chat menu, choose the apps you want to show. For each app/platform, you need to enter the URL or username accordingly.

In the Display tab, you can show the floating button on all WordPress pages or your selected pages. You can tweak the design or use your custom icon to make the button stand out or fit with your theme color profiles.

It allows your visitors to start a conversation quickly and assists your customer relationship management (CRM):

  • Live chat: Helps customers chat with support agents in real-time, enabling them to get quick responses to their queries.
  • Ticketing system: Allows customers to submit support tickets, which are then assigned to support agents who can work on them and provide timely responses.
  • Contact forms: Provides a simple way for customers to get in touch through their app in use.
  • Social media integration: Collect your leads on various social media platforms.

🏅 TYPICAL USE CASES

  • Floating contact button for brands, ecommerce sites, online stores
  • Help chat button for schools, courses, e-learning centers
  • Connect button for forums, communities, dating sites
  • Floating action button for market research companies, non-profit organizations
  • Call to action for marketing and other promotion campaigns
  • Extend your WordPress contact forms

🎏 COMPATIBILITY

WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget works seamlessly with all WordPress themes, page builders, website builders, and WooCommerce plugins.

♥️ Like this Support All-in-One Floating Widget Plugin?

  • Take a few secs to leave us a good rating.
  • Meet Bookster: Your customer service co-pilot. 🦾 → Creating an online booking form, scheduling appointments on WordPress site, and gaining insights for maximum impact & growth. 🚀
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with WordPress 6.0 and newer?

Definitely yes! We’re always up-to-date to give you the best experience in using our plugin.

Can I use it with WooCommerce?

Yes, this WordPress customer service plugin helps WooCommerce website owners convert prospects to leads or customers. It works seamlessly with these WooCommerce extensions, providing better customer support and boosting sales.

How can I get support if I encounter issues with this floating button plugin?

You can create a new topic in this WP Support All-in-One Floating Widget’s support channel. Otherwise, feel free to reach us at Ninja Team Support Center.
sections.changelog:
2.3.2

Mar 22, 2024 – Version 2.3.2
* Fixed: Change text-domain

2.3.1

Jan 31, 2024 – Version 2.3.1
* Fixed: Unable to open links from custom apps

2.3

Dec 18, 2023 – Version 2.3
* Fixed: Plugin deactivation error

2.2

Dec 13, 2023 – Version 2.2
* Fixed: Salient issue with WooCommerce

2.1

Dec 11, 2023 – Version 2.1
* Added: New built-in apps (Zalo, KakaoTalk, WeChat)
* Added: Ability to add multiple custom apps

2.0

Nov 22, 2023 – Version 2.0
* Added: Customize widget position
* Added: New widget style as popup
* Added: Users can add custom messaging app
* Added: Users can change the primary button to logo or custom image

1.2.2

Apr 09, 2021 – Version 1.2.2
* Initial Release

sections.reviews:
Didn't work and zero help with customer support

By cangelo87 on February 11, 2024

Plugin did not work and I couldn't get any help from customer support. It might be a great plugin but it never worked for me after repeated attempts and getting no response to customer support. It's a good thing it is free.

Heartfelt Thanks for Your Incredible Plugin!

By Nghia Lam (nghialam) on January 26, 2024

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the amazing plugin you've created. Our website has become more complete with your plugin after trying many different plugins.
Thank you once again for your incredible contribution to the WordPress community. Your dedication inspires us all.

The greatest click-to-chat plugin!

By JDani (vfxpro) on January 23, 2024

I've been using this plugin for a few years now. These days, I'm impressed by how the developers push out new updates that are way beyond my expectations. The latest version has improved the usability and functionality of the plugin tenfold. Great work!

Wonderfull.

By celsomineiro on January 21, 2024

Congratlations for your work. It´s wonderfull

short_description: Offer unlimited chat apps and support channels to your WordPress website.
